name: Time Thief (itch)
description:
Project Name: Time Thief

Team Name:  Dark Avalon

You have been tasked to infiltrate a AAA game company and steal some highly classified documents located in the owners office the place will be heavily guarded but lucky for you, you can alter the speed of time.

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Left Mouse Button = Time Accelerate

Right Mouse Button = Time Slow

Team members: 

Nathan Bell - Engine

Ryan Bourne - 3D Art Assets

James Findlay - 3D Art Assets

Callum Hay - 3D Art Assets

PreJam content:

Starter Content Textures

Third Person Template

Name of your submission: 
DarkAvalon_Time_Thief
